name: setrec2v
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0
body: -| wi(w0, wal(s0, wi(wss(cv(s0), c1), wss(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c1))))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
-| wnfc(s0, c2)
-| wceq(c0, csetrecs(c2))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, wi(wss(cv(s0), c1), wss(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c1))))
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
-| wnfc(s0, c2)
-| wceq(c0, csetrecs(c2))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, wi(wss(cv(s0), c1), wss(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c1))))
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

|- wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
-| wceq(c0, csetrecs(c2))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, wi(wss(cv(s0), c1), wss(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c1))))
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)

comment: Version of ~ setrec2 with a disjoint variable condition instead of a non-freeness hypothesis. (Contributed by Emmett Weisz, 6-Mar-2021.)
